--with-cfitsio=/home/giorgos/myLibraries/cfitsio \
--with-CCfits=/home/giorgos/myLibraries/CCfits \
--with-jsoncpp=/home/giorgos/myLibraries/jsoncpp \
--with-boost=/home/giorgos/myLibraries/boost \
--with-mpfr=/home/giorgos/myLibraries/mpfr \
--with-gmp=/home/giorgos/myLibraries/gmp \
--with-CGAL=/home/giorgos/myLibraries/CGAL \
